title: Launch on Product Hunt
description: Submit Hlavi to Product Hunt between 12:01-12:30am PST on a Tuesday/Wednesday/Thursday. Monitor throughout the day and respond to every comment within 2 hours. Post first comment immediately after launch.

acceptance_criteria.description: Submit launch at 12:01am PST on chosen day
Post first comment within 5 minutes of launch
Respond to every comment throughout the day
Share PH launch on Twitter, LinkedIn with link
